title: Font Identification Help
content:
Hello! I am not sure if this is a font or if it is a custom designed logo. It is a letter that I love, but would like to have as an "H" vs. the E. Unfortunately, I do not have the font in any other letters of the alphabet. Any guidance you can provide on what font it may be (or similar), or if you believe it to be a custom designed logo, I would appreciate!

Best,  
Haley

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [E.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018223904/http:/typophile.com/files/E_3.jpg) | 1.23 KB |
author: haleymo37

comments.content: It is either hand-lettered or it is part of an embroidery/monogram font collection. It may not exist in digital form.

The decorative part of the letter is a fleur de lys turned sideways. If want a similar symbol for your H try a google search for fonts fleur de lys. Plenty to choose from.  
Don
